description: Admin SDK lets administrators of enterprise domains to view and manage resources like user, groups etc. It also provides audit and usage reports of domain.
name: admin

applicationDataTransfers.description: List of per application data transfer resources. It contains data transfer details of the applications associated with this transfer resource.
